data.text:
This is his 2nd heart surgery so in my opinion even though he says heâ€™s fine we probably wonâ€™t see him in a sequel ðŸ˜¢

I loved the first Predator film, but in my opinion Arnold was the worst part of it. Iâ€™m probably alone in that opinion, but I just donâ€™t like him. I wish him Godspeed in recovering, and the best of health, but I wouldnâ€™t be upset not seeing him in another film.

But he is the reason why so many people love Predator, if it wasnâ€™t for his dlc the tapes and teases in Keyes audio logs, Predator Hunting Ground wouldnâ€™t be alive till this day especially since it went back to the original theme of the first movie, guys with guns in a jungle with a monster hunting them

I know Iâ€™m a minority. Maybe even the only one.

Nah thereâ€™s probably a lot but letâ€™s just agree to disagree and pray good health to Arnold

He has been eating a lot healthier these days. I saw a YouTube video where his fridge was almost all fruits and vegetables. I wonder if heavy bodybuilder and his past steroid use cause his heart trouble. A celebrity should be forth coming about such issues as they have the opportunity to benefit the multitude with their advice.

Guys. Itâ€™s ok. He was actually just in Cyberdyne getting routine maintenance. He is fine and will probably be killing some of you soon.

Heâ€™s certainly not a great actor, but for the role he played the part well, itâ€™s hard to imagine anybody else as Dutch now

This is true

For sure

Arnolds Fridge @ 2:57. Arnolds probably the coolest guy ever but he is an adulterer . I probably would be too if I was a movie star, honestly.

Not me, I love predator for the creature concept - also this is the same reason why I love Predator 2 more than Predator

" IL BE BACK!" Theres plenty of stunt men so Iâ€™m sure hel do one more predator

Body building always comes with additional stress on the heart.
